post.author: rich_is_bored
post.body:
I dunno who's tutorial that is but IMHO, it's bad practice to use boolean operations regardless what modeling package you're using.

There are plenty of other methods to create that clip. It's a shame I'm not familiar enough with MAX to explain them to you.

Oh BTW, could you resize that image so it's no wider than 640px please?

post.author: Slogbog
post.body: I think booleans have a time and place, but i agree that they should not be used on that clip. Some simple edge cutting and extruding would be a far better way IMO - and would leave a much cleaner result.

post.author: SyPHer_
post.body: Select all of the objects (Ctrl + A) and then use the scale tool (R) and scale it down! If it scales the objects seperatly then select all objects and goto Group -> Group, call it what you want and then scale it down. Post a screenshot of it ingame
